roleset.name: sight-seeing/showcasing event

example.name: both args
example.text: Charles and Diana visited a JC Penney 's on the prince 's last official US tour /.

example.name: with args 0 & 2
example.text: As part of his Barnstorm for Reform tour , he is joined by Republican governors from Connecticut , South Dakota , and Montana .

example.name: just arg2
example.text: With the success of a new television show and last year 's Oz-fest tour ready to kick off , things were looking great for Ozzy Osbourne .

example.name: with MNR
example.text: The main attractions include the so - called " eight views of Pali , " the ferry boat scenic tour , hiking on Mt. Kuanyin , Formosa Wonderworld theme park , and the Liao Tianding Temple .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on relation to tour-v.01, also comparison to parade-n.01. No corresponding VNcls.
